name: Friendship (itch) (ResacaGames)
description:
"Friendship" is a Lemmings-style puzzle game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Evade traps, holes and other dangers as a triangle while trying to keep as many friends as possible!

=====================================

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Scrollwheel - Zoom In/Out

Space - Dash

LMB or L.Ctrl - Follow

RMB or L.Alt - Wait

MMB or L.Shift - Run Away

E- Interact

R - Retry

Esc - Pause Menu

=====================================

Game created by Daniel Chernov

Music:

Spiel Mir for Barrel organ

Beethoven - Piano Sonata Op. 111, Version for Trio

Judica Beckmann – Flute

Anri Nishiyama – Clarinet

Hazel Beh – Piano
